# About this site

PIPER (PChem Inspired Pedagogical Electronic Resource) is an online collection of educational materials that may be useful for teaching and learning physical chemistry.

Contact Steve Singleton ssinglet@coe.edu with submissions (help us build the site!), suggestions, or questions.
